title: Limitation on liability
context: [ยง198D-7.6] Limitation on liability. The State shall not be liable for any injury to any person arising from the person&rsquo;s use of unimproved lands owned or controlled by the State and regulated under section 198D-6, unless the injury results from gross negligence on the part of the State. [L 1999, c 106, ยง1]
